EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi James , Nice to meet you via email! You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS>. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: James Schear [mailto:jamesmschear@gmail.com] Sent: Tuesday, August 28, 2012 11:46 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Greetings from James Schear Greetings Ms. Conde, Brendan suggested we connect to discuss my pending contract arrangement. Things are moving along so it would be beneficial to me if we can speak as soon as possible. I look forward to speaking with you. Kindly, JM Schear 706-951-4050
